attributes.action: Provide air purification units for all classrooms
attributes.additional_details: Children are being forced to sit in freezing conditions because teachers have no choice but to open windows to allow for ventilation, when air purification units would address the issue.
attributes.background: Compel the government to provide air purification units for classrooms

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Provide funding to fit air conditioning to classrooms: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596791

Improve Covid-19 Mitigation Measures in Schools: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/603513
